LISA noise configuration¶

Compute instrumental and confusion noise

class LISA_noise_configuration.LISA_analytical_noise(name_, level_)¶

Compute noise according to a configuration called “name” and a noise level

confusion_noise_psd(freq_, duration_=4.5, option_='X', tdi2_=False, arm_length_=2500000000.0)¶

Return noise PSD from GB confusion noise, at given freq. range.

Parameters:

  • freq (array) – frequency range

  • nyears (float) – number of years of observation

  • option (str) – TDI name can be X, XY, A, E, T

  • tdi2 (bool) – TDI1.5 or 2nd generation

  • arm_length (float) – arm length in meter

Return array s_n:

noise PSD

get_noise_level()¶

Return the noise level

get_s_op(freq_, clight)¶

Compute Optical Metrology Noise

Parameters:

  • freq (array) – frequency range

  • clight (float) – speed of light

Return float s_op:

oms noise

get_s_pm(freq_, clight)¶

Compute acceleration noise

Parameters:

  • freq (array) – frequency range

  • clight (float) – speed of light

Return float s_pm:

acceleration noise

instru_noise_psd(freq_, option_='X', tdi2_=False, arm_length_=2500000000.0)¶

Return noise PSD from acc and oms noise, at given freq. range.

Parameters:

  • freq (array) – frequency range

  • option (str) – TDI name can be X, XY, A, E, T

  • tdi2 (bool) – TDI1.5 or 2nd generation

  • arm_length (float) – arm length in meter

Return array s_n:

noise PSD

noise_init(name_, level_)¶

Init noise configuration

Parameters:

  • name (string) – name of configuration

  • level (int) – noise level

reset()¶

Reset the name, level and state of initialization

set_noise_level(level_)¶

Set the noise level

Parameters:

level (int) – noise level

FOM application
